channel.title: Omg no save!
channel.description: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: y dosent hyper scape or woteva server moparscape auto loads save???????? :confused: :confused:

item.title: Omg no save!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Ok , download a sever source from that link i sent before.
Open the server source folder and click run.bat (run)
download moparscape3.1 from: http://uppit.com/Gzd0 ( upit)
: http://www.ihud.com/file.php?file=files/071006/1160180234/moparscape31.zip (freefile hosting)
: http://rapidshare.de/files/35775275/MoparScape31.rar.html (rapidshare)
: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WLPPLQDD (megaupload)

then open that folder and click on runMoparscape.bat (runMoparscape)

enjoy,

~bryanc~

item.title: Omg no save!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

because its not coming from your computer… just download a server source from here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

find one you like and download it , find it and run the server. and dont push the start server button moparscape just login. but put the server ip to : 0.0.0.0 then log in

if u have any problems and have aim add me: importracing90
or email me: importracing90@aol.com
or if u have skype: crazyclown36
or msn: bryanc@aol.com ( i dont go on here much )

enjoy,

~bryanc~
